snippet.title: Baseless - Trailer
snippet.description:
Baseless is a challenging planet-jumping shooter that defies gravity. Shooting = Movement: blast from planet to planet with 360° gravity, creatively demolishing every enemy in your path to save your family. Fire powerful weapons, adopt cute friends, and discover a galaxy worth fighting for!

Be sure to wishlist Baseless on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1129260/Baseless/

Visit us at:
https://firstbreaklabs.com/
